_header: Either other thus to clothen and feed
Subjects: Paula, saint, life of; saints’ lives

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
…Eiþur oþur þus to cloþun and fedeSuch
                    purueaunce men schulde make…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffare wel Paula and prey for vsTo Godus sone þat is
                    Ihesus
BodEngPoeta1.Note: Acephalous due to loss of preceding folios.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Sammlung altenglischer Legenden.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1878: 3-8.
